data.text: The entire staff is outstanding! Shirley, Anna, Michael, Daniel, OJ, (and many more) at reception go above and beyond to cater to your needs. Youssef, Manika. Akshay, Mayul are  just a few names from the restaurant staff I’d like to mention although EVERY single staff member is top notch at customer support providing the best experience for the customer
data.title: Best customer experience

data.text:
Very nice amazing place and great people
Thanks for everyone 
Michael
Samir 
Shirley
Sorry about delay review but I stuck with business trip.
Thanks a lot for all of you
Definitely I will come back as soon as possible thanks for your service and your kindness
data.title: Impressive

data.text: Highly appreciated for the amazing customer service. From the reservation to restaurant during breakfast was amazed. Special thanks to Jam & Sherry for assisting me for my room reservation. Dani for smooth check in process, @bytes restaurant Baidhya & Manila for the amazing hospitality service. Housekeeping who maintain the cleanliness of my room bravo super clean and equiped. Food at breakfast very good a lot of variety. Thank you so much and very recommended.
data.title: Amazing stay and very good hospitality service.

data.text: We stayed for a week to attend a business meeting. Good service on check in, rooms are spacious and well equipped, robes, slippers, iron, tea and coffee making facilities. No plastic in the rooms, glass water bottles which were refilled daily, bathroom extras in paper wrappings. We ate at the roof bar one evening, lovely views over Dubai, and welcoming atmosphere. We had tapas style food, all of it really tasty.  For breakfast there was a wide range of choice and enjoyable. Really nice hotel, recommend for business or pleasure.
data.title: Enjoyable stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Grand Plaza Mövenpick Media City. We are thrilled to hear that you had an enjoyable stay during your business trip.

It is wonderful to know that you found our check-in service to be efficient and that you appreciated the spacious and well-equipped rooms, along with the environmentally friendly amenities. Sustainability is an important focus for us, and we are glad to see that our efforts are noticed and appreciated by our guests.

We are delighted that you had a memorable dining experience at our roof bar, and that you found our breakfast offerings to be diverse and enjoyable.

Thank you for recommending us and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Dubai.

Best regards, 

Karim Shawky
Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Karim Shawky

data.text: An amazing state of the art hotel. With great staff all around. I happened to loose some personality items and they were safely kept for me.Special Mention to Ms.Susan and the security team for the amazing job they are doing. I will be surely be coming back here
data.title: Great customer service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at Grand Plaza Mövenpick Media City.

We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff, especially Susan and our security team, contributed to making your visit memorable. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to her and the entire security team. 

Looking forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay in the future.

Best regards, 

Karim Shawky
Director of Operations
owner_response.author: Karim Shawky
